description: Search the web in real time to get trustworthy, source-backed answers. Find the latest news and comprehensive results from the most relevant sources. Use natural language queries to quickly gather facts, citations, and context.

apiKey.description: API key for the Linkup API. Get one from [here](https://app.linkup.so/home)

capabilities.name: linkup-search
capabilities.description: Search the web in real time using Linkup to retrieve current information, facts, and news from trusted sources. Use this tool for: real-time data (weather, stocks, sports scores, events), breaking news, current events, recent research, product information, up-to-date prices, schedules, and any information not available in your knowledge base. Returns comprehensive content from the most relevant sources.

capabilities.name: linkup-fetch
capabilities.description: Fetch a URL and return the content of the page. If you are unable to fetch the page content, might be worth trying to render the JavaScript content.
